PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-03572014-04-03,  IC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCopyright Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Definition of Local Signal and Distant Signal Regulations and the Definition of "Small Cable Transmission System" Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending THE DEFINITION OF LOCAL SIGNAL AND DISTANT SIGNAL REGULATIONS AND THE DEFINITION OF “SMALL CABLE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM” REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the retransmission framework is extended to the digital environment, maintaining the existing balance and policy whereby the retransmission of local signals is exempt from copyright liability; and (2) address a minor translation oversight, which was raised by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0080 Publication Date: 2014-04-23
AttachmentsAttachment
